mapper.select: SELECT no, content_id AS contentId, title, latitude, longitude, first_image1 AS firstImage1, hit, views FROM attractions LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}

SELECT no, content_id AS contentId, title, latitude, longitude, first_image1 AS firstImage1, hit, views FROM attractions WHERE (#{sidoCode} IS NULL OR area_code = #{sidoCode}) AND (#{gugunCode} IS NULL OR si_gun_gu_code = #{gugunCode}) AND (#{type} IS NULL OR content_type_id = #{type}) AND (#{word} IS NULL OR title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%')) ORDER BY CASE WHEN #{sortBy} = 'name' THEN title WHEN #{sortBy} = 'likes' THEN hit WHEN #{sortBy} = 'views' THEN views ELSE no END DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM attractions WHERE (#{sidoCode} IS NULL OR area_code = #{sidoCode}) AND (#{gugunCode} IS NULL OR si_gun_gu_code = #{gugunCode}) AND (#{type} IS NULL OR content_type_id = #{type}) AND (#{word} IS NULL OR title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{word}, '%'))

SELECT no, content_id AS contentId, title, content_type_id AS contentTypeId, area_code AS areaCode, si_gun_gu_code AS siGunGuCode, latitude, longitude, first_image1 AS firstImage1, first_image2 AS firstImage2, map_level AS mapLevel, tel, addr1, addr2, overview, hit, views FROM attractions WHERE no = #{attractionId}
